707490.name: Infectonator: Survivors - Soundtrack & Artbook
707490.description:
Infectonator: Survivors Original Soundtrack and Artbook

DLC Content

  • PDF artbook and developer notes
  • 22 original chiptune game soundtrack by Andrew Jeremy

Accessing The DLC

After purchasing and downloading Infectonator: Survivors Original Soundtrack and Artbook, you can access the content in the game's directory folder. Here are the steps to access the files:
  • Open up Steam and go to your Library tab
  • Right click on Infectonator: Survivors and select Properties
  • In the Properties window, select Local Files tab and find the "Browse Local Files" button.
  • This will take you to the Infectonator: Survivors' game directory, which has the Soundtrack and Artbook folder included in it.
As for the soundtrack, you can also enjoy it via your Steam Music Library
